id.comment: what are assignments with 'k' on right side that is parent of a while loop which follows another while loop?

query.querystr: assign a; variable v;while w1,w2; Select a pattern a(v,_"k"_) such that Parent(w1,a) and Follows(w2,w1)

id.comment: what are assignments with 'k' on right side that is parent of a while loop which is followed by another while loop?

query.querystr: assign a; variable v;while w1,w2; Select a pattern a(v,_"k"_) such that Parent(w1,a) and Follows(w1,w2)

id.comment: what are variables if there are assignments with 'k' on right side that is parent of a while loop which is followed by another while loop?

query.querystr: assign a; variable v,vv;while w1,w2; Select vv pattern a(v,_"k"_) such that Parent(w1,a) and Follows(w1,w2)

id.comment: Just one boolean clause

query.querystr: Select BOOLEAN

id.comment: is it true that 4 follows 3

query.querystr: Select BOOLEAN such that Follows(3,4)

id.comment: is it true that 3 follows 4

query.querystr: Select BOOLEAN such that Follows(4,3)

id.comment: is it true that 4 follows 3 and there is an assignment with 'y' on the right side with a variable v one the left side? In addition, there is an assignement which both modifies and uses v?

query.querystr: assign a; assign a2; variable v; Select BOOLEAN such that Follows(4,3) and Modifies(a2,v) and Uses(a2,v) pattern a(v,_"y"_)

id.comment: is it true that 3 follows 4 and there is an assignment with 'y' on the right side with a variable v one the left side? In addition, there is an assignement which both modifies and uses v.

query.querystr: assign a, a2; variable v; Select BOOLEAN such that Follows(3,4) and Modifies(a2,v) and Uses(a2,v) pattern a(v,_"y"_)

id.comment: What are the variable v such that there is an assignment with 'y' on the right side with v one the left side? In addition, there is an assignement which both modifies and uses v.

query.querystr: assign a, a2; variable v; Select v such that Follows(3,4) and Modifies(a2,v) and Uses(a2,v) pattern a(v,_"y"_)

id.comment: What are the variable v such that there is an assignment with 'i' on the right side with v one the left side? In addition, there is an assignement which both modifies and uses v and v is used by 26.

query.querystr: assign a, a2; variable v; Select v such that Follows(3,4) and Modifies(a2,v) and Uses(a2,v) pattern a(v,_"i"_) such that Uses(26,v)

id.comment: a multi clause query with one wrong clause at the end

query.querystr: assign a, a2; variable v;stmt s;while w; Select BOOLEAN such that Follows(3,4) and Modifies(a2,v) and Uses(a2,v) pattern a(v,_"i"_) such that Uses(26,v) and Follows*(s,w) and Uses(w,"lolo")

id.comment: a multi clause query with one wrong clause at the end

query.querystr: assign a, a2; variable v;stmt s;while w; Select w such that Follows(3,4) and Modifies(a2,v) and Uses(a2,v) pattern a(v,_"i"_) such that Uses(26,v) and Follows*(s,w) and Parent(w,w)

id.comment: What are the assignments with 'i' on the right side with v one the left side? In addition, there is an assignement which both modifies and uses v and follows the previous assignment.

query.querystr: assign a, a2; variable v; Select a such that Follows(3,4) and Modifies(a2,v) and Uses(a2,v) pattern a(v,_"i"_) such that Uses(26,v) and Follows*(a,a2)

id.comment: What are the assignments with 'y' on the right side with v one the left side? In addition, there is an assignement which both modifies and uses v and is followed* by an assignment with pattern(_,_'k'_)

query.querystr: assign a, a2; assign a3;variable v; Select a3 such that Follows(3,4) and Modifies(a2,v) and Uses(a2,v) pattern a(v,_"y"_) pattern a3(_,_"k"_) such that Follows*(a3,a2)

id.comment: What are the assignments with 'y' on the right side with v one the left side? In addition, there is an assignement which both modifies and uses v and is followed* by an assignment with pattern(_,_'k'_)

query.querystr: assign a, a2; assign a3;variable v; Select a2 such that Follows(3,4) and Modifies(a2,v) and Uses(a2,v) pattern a(v,_"y"_) pattern a3(_,_"k"_) such that Follows*(a3,a2)

id.comment: What are the while loop that is the first of a parent-chain of 4 while loop?

query.querystr: while w,w2,w3,w4; Select w such that Parent(w,w2) and Parent(w2,w3) and Parent(w3,w4)

id.comment: What are the while loop that is the first of a parent-chain of 3 while loop and the inner most loop is the parent of an assignment with pattern (m,_'y'_)

query.querystr: while w,w2,w3; assign a; Select w such that Parent(w,w2) and Parent(w2,w3) and Parent(w3,a) pattern a("m",_"y"_)

id.comment: Is it true that 17 uses z and is followed by 29 and 29 uses all variables and modifies m?

query.querystr: Select BOOLEAN such that Follows(17,29) and Uses(17,"z") and Uses(29,"x") and Uses(29,"y") and Uses(29,"m") and Modifies(29,"z") and Uses(29,"k") and Uses(29,"i")

id.comment: Is it true that 17 uses z and is followed by 29 and 29 uses all variables and modifies x?

query.querystr: Select BOOLEAN such that Follows(17,29) and Uses(17,"z") and Uses(29,"x") and Uses(29,"y") and Uses(29,"m") and Modifies(29,"x") and Uses(29,"k") and Uses(29,"i")

id.comment: What are the variables v and v2 so that v is on the left side of an assignment with _'k'_ on right side and v and v2 is in another assignment that have v on left and v2 on right

query.querystr: variable v,v2; assign a;assign aa; Select v such that Modifies(aa,v) and Uses(aa,v2) pattern a(v,_"k"_)

id.comment: What are the variables v2 and v so that v is on the left side of an assignment with _'k'_ on right side and v and v2 is in another assignment that have v on left and v2 on right

query.querystr: variable v,v2; assign a;assign aa; Select v2 such that Modifies(aa,v) and Uses(aa,v2) pattern a(v,_"k"_)

id.comment: What are the variables v2 and v so that v is on the left side of an assignment with _'k'_ on right side and that assignment has v on left and v2 on right

query.querystr: variable v,v2; assign a;assign aa; Select v2 such that Modifies(a,v) and Uses(a,v2) pattern a(v,_"k"_)

id.comment: What are the variables v so that v is on the left side of an assignment with _'y'_ on right side and that assignment modifies uses v?

query.querystr: variable v; assign a; Select v such that Modifies(a,v) and Uses(a,v) pattern a(v,_"y"_)
